addReview(string,string,string,string,st.details: Assumes the owner(author) of the review is the _msgSender()

params.id: - Id of the review generated by the client.
params.journalId: - Typically ISSN number of the journal
params.manuscriptId: - An identifier for the manuscript. This could be an internal id of a journal.
params.timestamp: - uint32 Unix timestamp when review is published

getHubAddr().details: Returns the address of the {IRelayHub} contract for this recipient.

getReview(string).details: Returns the Review struct as an ordered key value object. e.g. {0: 'JOURNALID', 1: ....}
getReview(string).return: journalIdmanuscriptIdmanuscriptHashtimestamprecommendationverified - bool that is true if 2 or more accounts vouched the review.vouchers - the list of addresses that vouched this review.

hasVouched(string).return: bool showing that Review is vouched by the _msgSender().

isVerified(string).return: bool showing if Review is verified.

postRelayedCall(bytes,bool,uint256,bytes.details: See `IRelayRecipient.postRelayedCall`.     * This function should not be overriden directly, use `_postRelayedCall` instead.     * * Requirements:     * - the caller must be the `RelayHub` contract.

preRelayedCall(bytes).details: See `IRelayRecipient.preRelayedCall`.     * This function should not be overriden directly, use `_preRelayedCall` instead.     * * Requirements:     * - the caller must be the `RelayHub` contract.

relayHubVersion().details: Returns the version string of the {IRelayHub} for which this recipient implementation was built. If {_upgradeRelayHub} is used, the new {IRelayHub} instance should be compatible with this version.

vouchReview(string).details: Assumes the voucher is the _msgSender(). Checks if the Review is already vouched by the same address.

acceptRelayedCall(address,address,bytes,.notice: Function to accept a gas station relayed call, can implement additional authentication - currently wide open

addReview(string,string,string,string,st.notice: Public method to add a review.

getReview(string).notice: Returns the Review belonging to the paramater address on the parameter index.

hasVouched(string).notice: Function to check if the Review at the given address and index is vouched by _msgSender()8i.

isVerified(string).notice: Function to check if the Review at the given address and index is verified. I.e. vouched by 2 or more accounts.

vouchReview(string).notice: Function to vouch a Review at the given address and index.
